title: Walnut Canyon National Monument: Eating & Sleeping
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping             Eating & Sleeping       There is no food service in the monument, but you can enjoy a picnic in the picnic area near the Visitor Center or travel into Flagstaff. Gas stoves are permitted, but no open fires. Please check at the Visitor Center for current fire restrictions. Water is available at the visitor center.
